Title: Setup the game prices automatically
Description:
Have the game prices calculated automatically according to the membership levels.

There are four memberships level: bronze (0-3 months), silver (3-6 months), gold (6-1year), platinum (1y+)
So for every game, there are 5 prices available:

non-member (full price)
bronze (10% cheaper)
silver (20% cheaper)
gold (30% cheaper)
platinum (50% cheaper)
 
If I could just put the first non-member price and then it would automatically calculate all the others, it would be great.

Non-member price should appear in games index cards (when not logged in)
Non-member price & all prices should appear in games show cards (when not logged in)
Author: Gueshly Masson

Title: Display $0 game prices as 'Free'
Description: Make games prices as Free (instead of 0$)
Author: Gueshly Masson

Title: Ask For Payment when trying to Sign In

Title: Memberships upgrade automatically
Description:
Every level has its according amount of time. After each amount of time, membership upgrades to the next following membership level. 
from bronze --> silver --> gold --> platinum .
Author: Gueshly Masson

Title: Make a game not visible when game is set to StandBy
Description: When admin changes a game availability to Standby, the game needs to not be visible to members (As we talked on the phone)
Author: Gueshly Masson
